summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center's Legal Department, providing the password for a drive containing discovery materials related to the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) for which discovery materials are being transmitted.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed the letter authorizing the transmission of discovery materials.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) Legal Department, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is official correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
It provides the password for a drive containing discovery materials pertinent to Ghislaine Maxwell's case.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings and evidence sharing in the Maxwell case as of August 2021.
